attributes.action: To gaurantee the security of the pensions of all lecturers across the UK
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.ucu.org.uk/studentvoice
There is plenty of evidence on this website regarding many aspects of the issue.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-43200128
This is just one of many articles that give some information on the situation.
attributes.background: To summarise, the lecturers and the academic staff at universities across the UK are the most important assets at the disposal of higher education and we should therefore be treating them with a bit more respect instead of substantially devaluing their contribution to education and this country.
